text: Antonio Ricci may refer to: *Antonio Ricci (bishop of Lecce) (died 1483), Italian Roman Catholic bishop *Antonio Ricci (archbishop of Reggio Calabria) (died 1488), Italian Roman Catholic bishop *Antonio Ricci (painter) (c1565-c1635), Italian-born Spanish painter *Antonio Ricci (bishop of Arezzo) (1573–1637), Italian Roman Catholic bishop *Antonio Ricci (tv writer) (1950)
title: Antonio Ricci
